mechanics.condition: A creature is touched AND the target is NOT an Undead AND the target is NOT a Construct
mechanics.outcome: Target regains hit points equal to 1d8 + Spellcasting Ability Modifier

mechanics.condition: Target is an Undead OR Target is a Construct

description_text: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
